entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sweetwater County through 315 PM MDT... At 252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Green River, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Uinta County through 330 PM MDT... At 252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Robertson, or 28 miles east of Evanston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sublette, northwestern Lincoln and southwestern Teton Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Palisades Reservoir, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
